name: StarLight (itch) (GuldorGames)
description:
Escape your doom and jump your mothership 7times to a safe heaven.

Manage food and ship damage, gather resources and update your fleet while escaping every time to safety.

GameJam Entree,
It all kind of works, but more time would have been better. Animation, effects, ballancing and more clear text stuff is still a bit missing.

Played using the mouse
